oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brothers in Concert: Christian Brothers Tercentenary Concert Tour
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Posters; Performances; Musicians; De La Salle Christian Brothers
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Brother Laurence Walther, of St. Mary's Winona, and Brother Vincent Malham, of Christian Brothers College, formed the idea of becoming a musical duo while on a liner in the Mediterranean. Under the name, "Brothers in Concert," they toured--whenever they weren't teaching--in Europe and the United States throughout the 1980s.
